code: import{authHeaderKeys}from'./constants';var defaultStorage=window.sessionStorage;export var getItemFromStorage=function getItemFromStorage(key){var storage=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:defaultStorage;return storage.getItem(key);};export var setItemToStorage=function setItemToStorage(key,value){var storage=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:defaultStorage;return storage.setItem(key,value);};export var clearItemFromStorage=function clearItemFromStorage(key){var storage=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:defaultStorage;return storage.removeItem(key);};export var saveAuthDataToDevice=function saveAuthDataToDevice(headers){var accessToken=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;authHeaderKeys.forEach(function(key){if(key.toLowerCase()==='authorization'.toLowerCase()){if(accessToken){setItemToStorage('token',accessToken);}else{setItemToStorage(key,headers[key]);}}});};
